title: DevOps Engineer (f/m/d)
body:
Who we are

At Bitpanda we are firm believers in the innovative power of cryptocurrencies, digitised assets and blockchain technology. As a result, Bitpanda has grown into a popular trading platform for newbies and experts alike. 

We are expanding rapidly and hence, we are seeking new, experienced and hands-on team members who think outside of the box (and are not afraid to share their thoughts), will deliver unique ideas and like to work in a fast-paced environment.

Your focus

  • The developer team constantly works on new features for our platform. These features are used by hundreds of thousands of customers worldwide.
  • You will be developing tools and improve systems and server setups to guarantee stability and security.
  • Since there are various areas in the frontend, backend, mobile or all around the platform, we collaborate in cross-functional teams to improve our system and develop new features.
  • You will develop our terraform codebase and infrastructure pipeline to support rapid feature delivery.
  • You will monitor and improve our systems and server setups to guarantee stability and security.
  • You will be working with the next generation Java and PHP application stacks and some of the most performant messaging solutions currently available. We are building a full-stack solution from scratch.

Why you

  • You are skilled in Linux Administration.
  • You are an expert on AWS based infrastructure (EC2, RDS, S3, SQS, etc.)
  • You have experience with Terraform
  • You have min. 1 year experience with Docker, and Kubernetes/ECS
  • You have experience with Gitlab CI/CD, Jenkins or similar
  • You have experience in building and maintaining real-time application monitoring with deep knowledge in trouble shooting hotspots
  • You are a passionate and driven team-member with experience in working in an agile team and commitment above average in a fast-growing environment

Why us

Bitpanda benefits

  • Flexible working hours
  • Latest hardware
  • Lunch and gym discount
  • Buddy program
  • Regular team events and a yearly team trip
  • Brand new office in the Viennese FinTech Hub
  • German classes


At Bitpanda, we strongly believe in the benefits of having a diverse team. Varied experiences, perspectives, and backgrounds lead to a better workplace and eventually to better products for our users. Thus, we actively foster diversity at Bitpanda. We believe in equal opportunities for everyone, no matter the nationality, skin colour, gender, religion, sexual orientation, age, seniority level, marital status, or disability status.

Bitpanda offers an ensured salary according to the collective agreement and a possible overpayment depending on the qualifications.
